q&a.question: Are you guys still looking for a graphic design intern?
q&a.answer: Yeah! Just send us an email to info@slingshotmentoring.com with a portfolio!

q&a.question: What all is asked in the Slingshot technical interview?
q&a.answer: Algorithms and data structures, Big O, recursion etc

q&a.question: If you got the final round thing through a hackathon can that carry over to a future internship round?
q&a.answer: We can't guarantee direct admission to another term at this time, but we're going to be moving to a rolling structure using our platform very soon in which case you can definitely use it to get an internship for another term.

q&a.question: How do we view the startups?
q&a.answer: Once you're accepted, there is an email with a link to an Airtable sheet where you can see the startup positions.

q&a.question: wait how are we supposed to match on 5/24 when we might not get the first response until 5/15?
q&a.answer: 5/24 is a tentative start date around which there's enough flexibility -- don't worry

q&a.question: Do we get a response even if we don't pass to the next stage?
q&a.answer: Yes, everyone should receive a response by may 15th.
